article_text:
More than 250 people met Friday to discuss the need to provide health care for all

Lack of health coverage connected to hospitalizations and poor academics, according to organizers

Organizers seek support of local elected officials

article_metadata.news-keywords: health, health care, undocumented, immigrants, health4all, insurance, coverage
article_metadata.description: More than 250 people gathered at Tenaya Middle School in south Merced on Friday to ask that health care be accessible to all, regardless of immigration status.
article_metadata.title: Merced groups seek health coverage for undocumented immigrants | The Merced Sun-Star
